content.value: Thanks to its strategic location, all of our rooms have a spectacular sea view, and in addition to this, they are equipped with mini bar, snacks, satellite TV, private bathroom and mosquito nets. We offer bar and restaurant service, as well as nautical sports services, such as: kitesurf, windsurf, SUP, fishing, kayak, hobbie cat, ski, wakeboard and paramotor.

Every morning our guests can enjoy a delicious cup of Colombian coffee, accompanied by our lovely Caribbean Sea view. In the afternoons, from your balcony or from the beach, you can enjoy the wonderful sunsets, and at night you can enjoy the calm and tranquility that our hostel offers.

Situated in the La Boquilla district in Cartagena de Indias, 6 km from Cartagena's downtown, Posada Kalea boasts a restaurant, beach bar and free WiFi. Guests can enjoy a cup of coffee every morning and beach views.
Rooms at Posada Kalea come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom equipped with a shower.

You can engage in various activities, such as kitesurfing, stand up paddle board, fishing and yoga. Cartagena's Walls is 7 km from Posada Kalea, while San Felipe de Barajas Castle is 7 km from the property.
La Boquilla is a great choice for travellers interested in beaches, food and restaurants.

description.description: Posada Kalea is a beachfront paradise hostel located in the north area of the city of Cartagena de Indias, Colombia, on one of the most extensive beaches of the “Corralito de Piedra” and only a few minutes from the most important hotels in the city, Las Americas Convention Center, 2KM from the Rafael Nuñez International Airport and only 7km from the historical center.
